nodes.text: A chronicle of galactic history was compiled by the Historical Council of the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances and released in 36 ABY in the wake of the Dark Nest Crisis. The chronicle itself was a second edition of an earlier chronicle, released in 25 ABY. The "Introduction to Students of History" that opened the work was written by archivist emeritus Voren Na'al. It was later quoted by Doctor Milanda Vorgan in "The Written Word: A Brief Introduction to the Writing Systems of Galactic Basic."
